version2.prototype.util

Class DatabaseCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • version2.prototype.util.DatabaseCache

  • public class DatabaseCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Database cache system interface. Frameworks use this to get and submit files from and to the database cache. Internally tracks and logs acquired and available files for each of the four frameworks and the global downloaders.
    Author:
    michael.devos

                             java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Add file(s) to their cache table. Paths are parsed for project, plugin, and process information. All files will be submitted as a single transaction.
        Parameters:
        filePath - - path to the cached data file

                                                                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Retrieves a list of files from the desired table that have yet to be retrieved by a ProcessWorker.
        Parameters:
        projectName - - project schema to look under
        pluginName - - plugin schema to look under
        process - - name of process to check output of for available files to process
        Returns:
        a list of available files to process
